TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceBusConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Creates and manages the contents of connection strings. You can use this class to construct a connection string for creating client messaging entities. It can also be used to perform basic validation on an existing connection string.

Docs.param: The connection string, which you can obtain from the Azure Management Portal.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified existing connection string.
Docs.exception: Throws if The connection string is missing endpoints.The connection string does not have enough information to form a token provider. For example, this can happen if you supplied a SasIssuer name but not a SasIssuer key.The value is not in a valid format.The or values are not in an integer format.
